snippet: The chairman, Vladimir A. Pekhtin, is the owner of expensive real estate, including an oceanfront apartment in Florida and property in Russia that was not listed on disclosure forms.
abstract: Vladimir A Pekhtin, chairman of ethics committee in Russia's lower house of Parliament, temporarily relinquishes his authority after bloggers post raft of documents on Internet showing him as owner of expensive real estate that he did not list on required disclosure forms.
lead_paragraph: The chairman, Vladimir A. Pekhtin, is the owner of expensive real estate, including an oceanfront apartment in Florida and property in Russia that was not listed on disclosure forms.

headline.seo: Russian Ethics Official Steps Aside Over Property Disclosures
headline.main: Russian Parliament Ethics Chief Steps Aside Over Reports of Undisclosed Properties
headline.print_headline: Russian Parliament Ethics Chief Steps Aside Over Reports of Undisclosed Properties
